## ExpectInterface.arrayOfLength() method

Matches an array containing exactly given number of items.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
arrayOfLength<T>(length: number): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  length | number | expected array length. Can be a matcher. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]
